original_text: But the crowds found out about this. So they went to find Jesus. When he saw the crowds coming, he welcomed them. He taught them about the kingdom of God. Some sick people were there and he made them well again.
korean_text: 무리가 알고 따라왔거늘 예수께서 그들을 영접하사 하나님 나라의 일을 이야기하시며 병 고칠 자들은 고치시더라

sentences.original_text: But the crowds found out about this
So they went to find Jesus
When he saw the crowds coming
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 무리들이 오는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: He taught them about the kingdom of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 하나님 나라에 대해 가르쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: and he made them well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들을 다시 낫게 해주었습니다
